subtitleNullable: Contains Fake and True news about russo ukrainian war
descriptionNullable:
#Context
This dataset contains about 10700 war news headlines from 24 February 11 December 2022 (from strart of full-scale russo-Ukrainian war). This is  the biggest news datasets and fully open-source. News was colected from Ukrainian telegram chanels and russian fake chanels.

Updated **data_set_4.csv** contains  <20 useless news, 
while **news_data.csv** about 1000 useless news

#Content
Each record in the dataset consists of the following attributes:
- Text: Title of news 
- Label: True if news approved and False if fake
##Number of Labels:
- `2498 False`
- `8237 True`
#Source
It was use this telegram chanels:
###Approved news
- [СУСПІЛЬНЕ НОВИНИ](https://t.me/suspilnenews)
- [Perepichka NEWS](https://t.me/perepichka_news)
- Ohuena Україна (not added yet) 
- [NR](https://t.me/nrpublic) (realy trusted source)
- [Новости Украины Online] (https://t.me/newsukraineonline24)
###Fakes
-[Вокс Україна](https://voxukraine.org/category/voks-informue/)
-[Война с фейками](https://t.me/warfakes)

Also was tried to colect news from others, more famouse telegram groups, but theirs news was too complicated for handing text 

#Inspiration
The dataset was made for a University project to classify news, so the news was collected more for ML processing and models use
